display_long_description:
# Welcome to the future. A future where the metaverse is yours to create and control. A world of interconnected spaces, apps, and people. Welcome to Multiverse.

Unlock the limitless potential of VR by designing your own metaverse, building, or city. Immerse yourself in a vibrant community where creativity thrives and like-minded explorers connect. Venture across the vast lands of Infiniverse, gaze at the wonders of the Planetarium, battle the undead in Zombietown, or **craft your own AI Agents.** 

Multiverse is your gateway to endless opportunities — whether you want to make friends, explore, or build something extraordinary. With a **free set of templates**, you can create your own VR space, link to your favorite apps, upload content, and promote real-world goods and services.

Now is the time to join the VR revolution and shape the future of content creation and browsing.

**Come and meet us on the frontier of technology. Go on. Get started. The future is yours to create.**

🚀 **IMPORTANT UPDATE:** A VR headset is no longer required to join Multiverse! Now available on PC via the Meta Quest Link App.

🔗https://www.multiverseupdates.com/tutorial 🔗
